Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Provides insurance corporations with a tax credit for investments made in rural business growth funds; establishes the New York agriculture and rural jobs fund
Summary: Relates to providing insurance corporations with a tax credit for investments made in rural business growth funds; establishes the New York agriculture and rural jobs fund.
LawCode: Add §§45 & 187-q, amd §§1511 & 210-B, Tax L; add §99-ii, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to providing insurance corporations with a tax credit for investments made in rural business growth funds; and to amend the state finance law, in relation to establishing the New York agriculture and rural jobs fund
